entry.title: Producing professional deliverables
entry.content: It was 2008 when I first received a bad feedback about a job I did. My team was performing 360 Degree Feedback. The feedbacks were appaling. I never had that feeling before. Why did people feel like I was a complete fraud? I mean, they complained quite a lot about how they were supposed to maintain such a messy service.
entry.summary: It was 2008 when I first received a bad feedback about a job I did. My team was performing 360 Degree Feedback. The feedbacks were appaling. I never had that feeling before. Why did people feel like I was a complete fraud? I mean, they complained quite a lot about how they were supposed to maintain such a messy service.
